title: Line By Line Bible Studies - Thessalonians 1 and 2 -
description:
Line By Line Bible Studies - Thessalonians 1 and 2 (Completed, March 31th 2009) by Paul Stringini

You can find this and many other free line by line bible studies at http://oraclesofgod.org/studies/

This torrent was created with full authorization from the author of the work, enjoy and share.

Thessalonians was the second bible study Paul Stringini recorded for the internet, though he has been teaching the bible since 1993. 

Series #1 The New Testament Epistles
Studies in this series:

Romans 12:12:56 (March 25th 2009) 
I Corinthians 22:51:17 (June 23, 2009)
II Corinthians 11:30:22 (March 12-27, 2010)

Ephesians 8:28:07 (April 11, 2009)
Philippians 4:30:21 (April 15, 2009)
Colossians 4:50:26 (April 17, 2009)
I & II Thessalonians 4:31:32 (March 31, 2009)
I Timothy 5:45:29 (April 21, 2009)
II Timothy 3:28:22 (April 21, 2009)
Titus & Philemon 3:01:41 (April 21 2009)
Hebrews 12:34:03 (March 29 - April 12, 2010)
James 4:17:46 (April 23, 2009)
I Peter 5:52:21 (April 27, 2009)
II Peter 4:28:21 (April 28, 2009)
I, II,&III John 9:49:00 (May 7, 2009)
